item.title: Zapotechnica
item.description: Cocktail Fruity and complex, this smoky crowd-pleasing sour goes down way too easy. 2 oz Mezcal* ¼ oz Chartreuse Yellow 1 oz Grilled Pineapple Cordial ¾ oz lime juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some finishing salt. *Recommended: Del Maguey Vida, El Silencio, Creyente Joven, Banhez Joven Espadín y Barril

item.title: Inca Trail
item.description: Cocktail A polished version of the tart classic Pisco Sour that will transport your senses straight to the Andes. 2 oz Peruvian Pisco* ¾ oz Lime Cordial ½ oz lime juice ½ oz egg white Add all ingredients to shaker, perform dry shake until egg white is properly frothed. Add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with nutmeg grated over the foam. *Recommended: La Diablada, Macchu Pisco

item.title: Flat Earth
item.description: Cocktail An earthy, restorative sour with complexity that’ll make you question your own sanity. 1 ½ oz Gin* ¾ oz 80-proof Orange Liqueur** ¾ oz Roasted Walnut Orgeat ½ oz Beet Shrub ½ oz lemon juice 8 dashes (8 ml) Habanero Tincture Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lemon wheel. *Recommended: Vitae Modern Gin, Aviation, Botanist, Plymouth **Recommended: Vitae Orange Liqueur, Cointreau

item.title: Appaloosa
item.description: Cocktail A spicy, lively sour with a velvety mouthfeel and a ‘green’, vegetal flavor profile. 1 ½ oz 100% Agave Reposado Tequila* ¾ oz Ancho Reyes Verde Chili Liqueur 1 oz lime juice ½ oz Pepita Orgeat Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain over new ice in rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel perched on top of the drink, sprinkled with some finishing salt.
